## formatPath() function

Returns a string that represents the specified value path

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function formatPath(path: PathArray): string;
```

|  --- | --- | --- |
|  path | [PathArray](./paratype.patharray.md) | The path to the formatted |
